title: Validate Translations executor
description: Validates that all translation keys used in code exist in translation files and reports unused keys

projectPath.description: Path to the Angular project to analyze (relative to workspace root)

translationsPath.description: Path to the directory containing translation JSON files (e.g., apps/demo/public/assets/i18n)

outputFile.description: Path where the validation results should be saved as JSON (relative to workspace root)

tsconfigPath.description: Optional path to tsconfig.json (defaults to projectPath/tsconfig.json)
